00036 void cleanup(int ret)
00037 {
00038   // stop all mpi clients
00039 
00040 #ifdef MPI
00041   int task=TASKFIN;
00042   BroadcastTask(&task);
00043 
00044   MPI_Finalize();
00045 #endif
00046  
00047   // terminate program with return code
00048   exit(ret);
00049 }

00052 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00053 {
00054 
00055   createinfo(argc, argv);
00056 
00057 #ifdef MPI
00058   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00059   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00060   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00061 
00062   fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00063 
00064   if (mpirank != 0) {
00065     ProjectionSlave();
00066 
00067     MPI_Finalize();
00068   } else {
00069 #endif
00070 
00071   // enough arguments ?
00072 
00073   if (argc < 4) {
00074     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPARA INTERACTION [SYMMETRY:]MBSTATE"
00075             "\n   -h                hermitize matrix elements"
00076             "\n   -K K              max K"
00077             "\n   -A                show really all eigenstates\n",
00078             filepart(argv[0]));
00079     cleanup(-1);
00080   }
00081 
00082   int all=0;
00083   int hermit=0;
00084   int Kmax=999, K;
00085   int odd;
00086   double threshkmix=0.00001;
00087   double minnorm=0.005;
00088 
00089   /* manage command-line options */
00090 
00091   char c;
00092   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "hK:At:")) != -1)
00093     switch (c) {
00094     case 'h':
00095       hermit=1;
00096       break;
00097     case 'K':
00098       Kmax = atoi(optarg);
00099       break;
00100     case 'A':
00101       all=1;
00102       break;
00103     case 't':
00104       threshkmix = atof(optarg);
00105       break;
00106     }
00107 
00108   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00109   char* interactionfile = argv[optind+1];
00110   char* mbfile = argv[optind+2];
00111 
00112   // get Symmetry
00113   Symmetry S;
00114   extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile, &S);
00115 
00116   // only SlaterDets can be used as many-body states up to now
00117   SlaterDet Q;
00118   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, mbfile))
00119     cleanup(-1);
00120 
00121   // get rid of path in filename
00122   char* mbname = filepart(mbfile);
00123 
00124   Interaction Int;
00125   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00126     cleanup(-1);
00127   Int.cm = 1;
00128 
00129 #ifdef MPI
00130   int task=TASKSTART;
00131   BroadcastTask(&task);
00132   
00133   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00134   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00135 #endif
00136 
00137   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00138   odd = Q.A % 2;
00139 
00140   // defaults for Kmax
00141   if (Kmax == 999)
00142     Kmax = odd ? 7 : 8; 
00143 
00144   // Projection parameters
00145   Projection P;
00146   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00147 
00148   initOpObservables(&Int);
00149 
00150   // initialize space for matrix elements
00151   Observablesod **obsme = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables);
00152 
00153   // try to read ME's from file, if not possible calculate and save
00154 
00155   if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile, mbfile, &P, &OpObservables, S, S, obsme)) {
00156 #ifdef MPI
00157     calcprojectedMBMEmpi(&P, &OpObservables, &Q, &Q, S, S, obsme);
00158 #else
00159     calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &Q, &Q, S, S, obsme);
00160 #endif
00161     writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile, mbfile, &P, &OpObservables, S, S, obsme);
00162   }
00163 
00164   // scale matrix elements
00165   if (Int.mescaling) {
00166     fprintf(stderr, "... scaling matrix elements\n");
00167     scaleprojectedObservablesMBME(&P, &Int, obsme);
00168   }
00169 
00170   // hermitize MEs
00171   if (hermit)
00172     hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme, 1);
00173 
00174   // write output
00175   FILE *outfp; 
00176   char outfilename[255];
00177 
00178   snprintf(outfilename, 255, "%s%s.%s-K", mbfile, 
00179            S==0 ? "" : strjoin(":", SymmetrytoStr(S)),  
00180            ProjectiontoStr(&P));
00181 
00182   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfilename, "w"))) {
00183     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfilename);
00184     cleanup(-1);
00185   }
00186 
00187   fprintinfo(outfp);
00188   fprintProjectinfo(outfp, &P);
00189   fprintf(outfp, "# used Symmetry - %s\n", SymmetrytoStr(S));
00190 
00191   // first full K-mixing
00192 
00193   fprintf(outfp, "\n# full K-mixing\n");
00194 
00195   // solve the eigenvalue problem
00196   Eigenstates E;
00197   initEigenstates(&P, &E, 1);
00198   calcEigenstates(&P, &Int, &obsme, &E, threshkmix);
00199 
00200   // calculate expectation values
00201   Observablesod** obs = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, 1);
00202   calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme, &S, &E, obs);
00203     
00204   // sort Eigenstates
00205   sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &E, minnorm, all);
00206 
00207   // output Observables
00208   showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q, obs, &E, NULL, "");
00209 
00210   // now for each K-projection
00211 
00212   for (K=-Kmax; K<=Kmax; K=K+2) {
00213 
00214     char pre[12];
00215 
00216     if (P.odd) sprintf(pre, "[K = %+d/2]", K);
00217     else sprintf(pre, "[K = %+d]", K/2);
00218 
00219     calcEigenstatesK(&P, &Int, &obsme, &E, K, threshkmix);
00220 
00221     // calculate expectation values
00222     calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme, &S, &E, obs);
00223     
00224     // sort Eigenstates
00225     sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &E, minnorm, all);
00226 
00227     // output Observables
00228     showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q, obs, &E, NULL, pre);
00229 
00230   }
00231 
00232   fprintf(outfp, "\n# end of file\n");
00233 
00234   fclose(outfp);
00235 
00236   cleanup(0);
00237 
00238 #ifdef MPI
00239   }
00240 #endif
00241 }
